TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示受支持像素格式的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分配了 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr24 { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Bgr24
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用的每个像素的数据的 24 位 (8[!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]为每个三个主色，即蓝色、 绿色和红色)。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). 这将转换为的每个主要颜色，以便为每个映像提供最多为 1600 万颜色 256 色调。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 若要显示图像、 监视器和控制器必须能够显示至少 32000 颜色。To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取黑白像素格式，该格式将每像素的一位数据显示为黑色或白色。

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Cmyk32 { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Cmyk32
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它可显示 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]，每个颜色通道（青色、洋红色、黄色和黑色通道）分配 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMYK 颜色系统通常用于打印墨迹为了文档。The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. 这种类型的颜色表示为窗体 cmyk （C %、 M %、 Y %、 K %），其中 C、 M、 Y 和 K 是颜色的青色、 洋红色、 黄色和黑色值的百分比值。This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Default { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat Default
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取最适合于特定操作的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上讲不是像素格式，但而是一种访问方法像素格式，它最适用于特定操作。 is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. 此格式用于特定像素格式，它不重要的情况。This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: 一种像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板映像使用颜色表用于确定映像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 在图中每个像素映射到表或调色板中具有特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每个颜色都由其索引号或值，该值对应于在表中的位置标识。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 像素格式，它具有 2 种颜色表中可用。The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（红色、绿色和蓝色通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用的每个像素 （8 位 / 像素的三种基本色红色、 绿色和蓝色每个） 的数据的 24 位。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). 这将转换为的每个主要颜色，以便为每个映像提供最多为 1600 万颜色 256 色调。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 映像等同于图像，但颜色通道 （红色、 绿色和蓝色） 位于不同的顺序。An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

每个通道（红色、绿色、蓝色和 alpha 通道）都分配了 16 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each channel (red, green, blue, and alpha) is allocated 16 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

summary.span: 此像素格式的 gamma 值为 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.
